body: Hello people. Have a quick question. When you "prepare geometry", how do you generate windows? I started my journey into HB with Chris's tutorials first, where he keep surfaces untouched and just create windows as coplanar surfaces where he needs. Then I saw Mostapha's "punching" method and got a bit confused. Is there any difference or it is just a matter of one's approach? [](http://api.ning.com/files/tUpf1dE*xKYOX2ZESlcz*RhcI4WPb6Ax1tYj6QQb7-*HgqxN7wdwPsyDLhNTFZ9E0flsIMo*S5Zk28jDFO4ZRtMY3YeRD-AE/Capture.PNG) Both ways seem to give same results, can you comment on this? I'd like to go Chris's minimalistic way but want to be sure there are no caveats. Thanks.
